Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lelion Way, north of the Wakarimasu Park.
Room.LongDescription: The large Wakarimasu Park, located to the south, is one of the larger city parks in Oceancrest. The primary function of the park is to give a positive image of the city as people walk in from the eastern city gates. To the north is the Snake Eyes Gambling Facility.
